name: trophy-forge
description: Here you can generate your own custom trophy card using different templates.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run open-browser"
scripts.open-browser: npx wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npx open-cli http://localhost:5173
scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
